name: URL:DECODE
description: Decode a URL-encoded input string using the specified character set.

controls.name: charsetName
controls.description: The name of the character set to use for decoding (e.g., 'UTF-8', 'ISO-8859-1'). If not specified, default to `UTF-8`.

examples.description: Decodes the URL-encoded input string using UTF-8.

name: URL:ENCODE
description: Encode an input string into a URL-encoded string using the specified character set.

controls.name: charsetName
controls.description: The name of the character set to use for encoding (e.g., 'UTF-8', 'ISO-8859-1'). If not specified, default to 'UTF-8'.

input.name: input
input.description: The plain input string to encode into a URL-safe format.

examples.description: Encodes the input string using UTF-8.
